title: BUG IN NEW CLIENT NEED HELP
body:
There is a giant bug that has been not allowing me to launch league of legends client for a while. I've even captured a picture of the bug and put a link right here https://gyazo.com/8b2a06e2ea42c24d5702591581dcdabe. This bug causes my screen to go black and I cannot click anything on the screen. I have  tried for 2 weeks to try and resolve this problem such as re downloading the game. I have also tired this 

Go to install directory
Ex: "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends"
Go to Rads -> system 

Open: user.cfg in notepad
Change "leagueClientOptIn = yes" to
-------------- "leagueClientOptIn = no"

Go back to install directory
Right click on "lol.launcher.exe"
Create shortcut
Click and drag onto desktop

Double Click shortcut to open old client

This hasn't work to resolve my issue either to get back to the old client. ASSISTANCE WOULD BE APPRECIATED

replies.body:
From your screenshot, it looks like the issue may be happening as a notification for something (maybe Beta Client) is trying to pop up. I'd recommend [**performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure no background apps are causing this issue.

If you still experience this after taking those steps, let me know.

I tried to reboot and this black fog on my client screen still pops up and I don't know what to do anymore.

Since you made manual modifications to your game files, it's possible something went wrong in the process. I'd recommend a *clean reinstall* of League to ensure no corruptions or misconfigurations are the culprits. You can complete this task by following [**these instructions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

Let me know if this did the trick!

I'm pretty sure I have followed these directions clearly and the black shade still stands over my screen. I also haven't had problems downloading league client in the past until now.

Damn, I figured that would resolve this. At this point, I'd like to escalate this to our tech specialists so we can troubleshoot this further. If you run a set of system logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to assist further.

Let me know if you have any questions.
